name: BLOOD FARM
description:
BLOOD FARM is a low poly horror game about well escaping a farm owned by a murderous family, that has killed all your friends and girlfriend. Now you just got to hope you can make it out alive instead of ending up on the other side of a chainsaw.

NOTICE: 

I have been made aware that the boomstick ending is still bugged to where you only need to kill one of the main three, when you need to kill all three, something must of happened during exporting, I do have one idea to make it work as intended but I'm currently  somewhere without access to the files, I'll try and patch it when I can.
